product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 67 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, feminine layout highlighting a pair of rose gold earrings at the center-right ('product_image'). The background is divided into four soft-toned geometric quadrants, enhanced by subtle decorative circles and diagonal lines ('background'). The top-left features a bold brand name ('heading') and a modern subheading ('subheading') indicating the product type. The bottom-left section lists product highlights in a bullet format ('description'). Just below, the product price is prominently displayed in a large font ('price'), followed by a rounded rectangular call-to-action button ('cta_background') with bold uppercase text ('cta'). The design delivers elegance through its symmetry and soft visuals.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink: `#FFF5F5`, `#FAE1E1`, `#F8D7D7`, `#FFD1D1`, `#FFCACA`
- Accent Pink: `#F5A3A3`, `#FFCDD2`, `#E57373`
- Text & CTA: `#9C2754`, `#C75278`, `#5D2538`, `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product showcases a delicate and elegant color palette dominated by soft rose gold (#EBA6A3), shimmering white diamonds (#FFFFFF), and a subtle blush pink (#FAD3D5) used in petal elements. The rose gold metal framework harmonizes beautifully with the clear brilliance of the stones, creating a balanced yet dynamic contrast. The jewel tones blend seamlessly due to well-defined edges and reflective surfaces that provide depth. The soft pink accent is softly highlighted, enhancing the floral motif without overpowering the sparkle of white stones. This harmonious blend of metallic warmth and crystalline clarity is ideal for a luxurious, feminine advertisement banner.
